languages.text: Собирая информацию и слухи о своих исчезнувших спутниках, Лорд-капитан сможет отыскать их и узнать их судьбу.
By collecting rumours and information on {mf|his|her} missing companions, the Lord Captain will be able to find them and learn about their fate.
languages.original_text: Собирая информацию и слухи о своих исчезнувших спутниках, Лорд-капитан сможет отыскать их и узнать их судьбу.

traits.locale_text: By collecting rumours and information on the missing companions, Lord Captain will be able to find them and learn about their fate.
By collecting rumours and information on {mf|his|her} missing companions, the Lord Captain will be able to find them and learn about their fate.
By collecting rumours and information on {mf|his|her} missing companions, the Lord Captain will be able to find them and learn about their fate.

languages.text: En recueillant des informations et en écoutant des rumeurs concernant ses compagnons disparus, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} pourra les trouver et savoir ce qui leur est arrivé.
languages.original_text: By collecting rumours and information on {mf|his|her} missing companions, the Lord Captain will be able to find them and learn about their fate.

traits.locale_text: En recueillant des informations et en écoutant des rumeurs concernant ses compagnons disparus, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} pourra les trouver et savoir ce qui leur est arrivé.

languages.text: 行商浪人需要不断收集传言与信息，弄清楚那些失踪的伙伴都去了什么地方，得知他们的遭遇。
languages.original_text: By collecting rumours and information on {mf|his|her} missing companions, the Lord Captain will be able to find them and learn about their fate.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人需要不断收集传言与信息，弄清楚那些失踪的伙伴都去了什么地方，得知他们的遭遇。

languages.text: 行方不明になっているロード・キャプテンの仲間に関する噂や情報を集めれば、彼らを見つけ出し、その運命を知ることができるかもしれない。
languages.original_text: By collecting rumours and information on {mf|his|her} missing companions, the Lord Captain will be able to find them and learn about their fate.

traits.locale_text: 行方不明になっているロード・キャプテンの仲間に関する噂や情報を集めれば、彼らを見つけ出し、その運命を知ることができるかもしれない。

languages.text: Wenn der Lord Captain Gerüchte und Informationen zu seinen verschwundenen Gefährten sammelt, kann er sie finden und erfahren, was aus ihnen geworden ist.
languages.original_text: By collecting rumours and information on {mf|his|her} missing companions, the Lord Captain will be able to find them and learn about their fate.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Lord Captain Gerüchte und Informationen zu seinen verschwundenen Gefährten sammelt, kann er sie finden und erfahren, was aus ihnen geworden ist.

languages.text: Al descubrir rumores e información sobre sus compañeros desaparecidos, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán podrá encontrarlos y descubrir qué les ha pasado.
languages.original_text: By collecting rumours and information on {mf|his|her} missing companions, the Lord Captain will be able to find them and learn about their fate.

traits.locale_text: Al descubrir rumores e información sobre sus compañeros desaparecidos, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán podrá encontrarlos y descubrir qué les ha pasado.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, kaybolan yoldaşlarıyla ilgili söylenti ve bilgileri toplayarak onları bulacak ve kaderlerini öğrenecek.
languages.original_text: By collecting rumours and information on {mf|his|her} missing companions, the Lord Captain will be able to find them and learn about their fate.
